snippet: Edward Snowden would be willing to enter talks with U.S. Attorney General Eric Holder to negotiate his return to the United States but not without a guarantee of amnesty, his legal adviser said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Snowden Won't Return to U.S. Without Amnesty, Says Legal Adviser
headline.main: Snowden Won't Return to U.S. Without Amnesty, Says Legal Adviser

lead_paragraph: Edward Snowden would be willing to enter talks with U.S. Attorney General Eric Holder to negotiate his return to the United States but not without a guarantee of amnesty, his legal adviser said on Sunday.
